Senior financial executive for both Primavera Online High School/Middle School, Arizona’s largest online charter school, as well as StrongMind, a custom software development group that develops and supports online learning platforms and self-authored digital curriculum that power online learning.

Synergy Solutions specializes in providing customer contact solutions to clients in a variety of industries. Synergy Solutions operates call centers in Phoenix, AZ, Bemidji, MN and offers programs through a network of certified near-shore partners.
Dual role as CFO/COO for Live Response Solutions, an innovative  call center operation focused on driving "lead-to-lease" throughput in the multi-family housing industry.
Senior Finance Manager for a startup wearable technology company during early stage product development.

Senior financial executive for a $110MM manufacturer and retailer of decorative landscaping and building materials.  This position was created for the purpose of bringing the company’s financial reporting system up to a level where the business could be marketed.
